title: Her Mother's Keeper
description: Pansy: Thinking of YouOnce again, self-appointed guardian Gwen Lacrosse was racing to save her sweet but too-trusting mother from scandal and disgrace. This time, Mama was caught in the clutches of the dastardly Luke Powers, an amorous—and much younger—man. But back home, things weren't quite what Gwen expected. And her traitorous thoughts kept leading her to Luke...
author: Nora Roberts
